评论详情: What a pleasant surprise to find that this lightweight, yet warm, pullover would be so amazing!  The comfort, quality, color, EVERYTHING!!! Was simply above my expectations.  It was a gift to my daughter who immediately put it on and began enjoying.  What are you waiting for...order now!
This sweater was the perfect fit and true to size. It’s very flattering. The material is silky smooth and lays just right

Was very impressed with the quality and fit of this. It's not too oversized. It's loose, but doesn't appear "frumpy". Just ordered it in a second color. The material is the perfect weight for a "cool" day. Definitely one of the best Amazon purchases I've made.

This sweatshirt is extremely soft and comfortable. It looks much nicer than a basic sweatshirt because of the material and the zipper and collar. It is not especially long, but it is definitely not a crop sweatshirt. So if you're looking for something a little longer than the crops, this is a good choice.

This is a great V@rley knockoff.  *The material is buttery smooth inside and out just like V@rley. *material thickness is about the same *The zipper isn’t shiny like V@arley. *drape is about the same *funnel neck when fully zipped up  Overall, great buy considering the v@rley version is $138.
Love this shirt so much .  Casual but dressy. So soft and comfortable
Super cute and soft, but discolored the first time I washed it. In cold water. Very disappointed, wont buy this brand again

I wear a size medium normally but when I want an oversized look will usually size up. If you want an oversized look in the this sweater, probably consider sizing up.  I bought a medium (my true size) and it fits perfectly! I love the length so much considering most things are cropped way short these days. Even through pregnancy it fits great. It’s my go to top so it’s good I keep buying in different colors.  Thickness is incredible! It’s not terribly thick so I think I’ll be able to wear it during summer but it’s also not super thin so it’s nice during the winter too. Just a great closet staple!

It is  semi cropped. If your want it to go down to your hips or such this isn't for you. I'm 5'1 and this is the perfect length for me in the size I got. It is super soft and keeps me warm without making it too hot
This top is is exceptional for the price. The color is right on as with the size. Love the style and have had many compliments on how nice it looks on me. And yes I would buy again.
A lot of reviews said this was cropped, but I'm fairly short and it sits perfectly at my hips. Very roomy and silky soft. I ordered two more in different colors as soon as I tried it on.
Soft fabric and fits well

评论概述: Excellent dupe for spanx air essentials
评论详情: I have the air essentials by spanks and saw this product, which looked very similar to what I own. I’ve purchased the medium based on Amazon recommendations. However, I own a small in the Spanx product. I am exchanging the medium for a small. The Material feels very similar and the zipper is identical to the air essentials product.  I will buy it in more than one color.
This was probably the nicest quality sweater. I have purchased on Amazon would love to purchase more from this company. Exceeded my expectations.
This may be the softest shirt in my closet! Super cute and can be worn with leggings, jeans etc! I’m wearing a small.
This exceed my expectation. It’s so soft and easy to dress up or down. It looks good with jeans or leggings. I love the dark gray
Alittle wide.

Great sweatshirt.  It is made to fit a little short.  Wear L, ordered XL for oversized fit could have easily worn L, 5'6" 173 lbs. Wear over black tank with black joggers and yoga pants.  Fabric is soft and feels luxurious.  Would order again.
The feel of the sweatshirt is great. It’s warm and bright white in color not dull.
It is a bit boxy but the material is unusual but soft and buttery. The first day I wore it I received a compliment.
The fabric is very nice.  Love the fit and the zipper is classy looking.  So glad I got the white because I layer with other color tees underneath.  Great look with leggings.
This sweater is seriously the best! I originally bought the light grey one and fell in love so I had to purchase more. It's super soft and washes well. Highly recommend!
True to size  My favorite of the season.  I have bought in all colors!!!  Dupe of spanx!!!
Like the material..The only thing I can find fault with is that it rides up from bottom. Fit was perfect.
Cute mom-on-the-go look.
Very happy with this purchase. It is very comfortable and soft and perfect for fall weather.

评论概述: 💯 happy with this purchase in WA State
评论详情: There isn’t a thing about his purchase I’m not happy with. I’m 65 years old. 5’7 154 pounds and have a DD cup and broad shoulders and I no longer like shortie tops. I ordered a medium and it fits perfectly. I used to be a Nordstrom gal but being retired and not dressing for a job = can’t justify that level.  Buy it. You’re going to like it!

评论概述: I love this top! Luxurious fabric, feels and looks very high-end

I ordered a large. While I loved the look, and reviews said it ran small, I typically wear a L to XL, this was to big. Especially in the armpit and shoulder area. I'm 5'7" and weigh around 160.
So comfortable and soft. Warm without being heavy

This sweatshirt is buttery soft and a perfect weight.  I'm 5' 3" 135 lbs and I got a medium, fits great, plenty of room.  I am buying it in another color I love it so much.  Someone mentioned the zipper looking cheap,  I am very particular and I think the zipper is very athleisure and looks fine.  Color is just as expected.  I bought the coffeerey.
Great quality! Super soft!
Elegant and soft
Fits like a dream . Graham knit fabric. Love the neutral color.

评论概述: Terrific buy and comfortable to wear.

Love this! Can dress it up or down! Super soft and washes nicely. Going to buy this in every color!

评论概述: I bought these in almost every color

100% buttery soft! Exactly like LuLu ones but fraction of the price. I’m 120#, 5’6 and the small is oversized but perfect! Staple to the wardrobe!

This sweater is a MUST have. It is super soft, gorgeous color in person, great fit and totally a steal! Ordering in all the colors! Love just as much if not more than lululemon! If you are looking for a cute pullover for fall this is it!! True to size!

I really like this pullover. The material is soft and is super comfortable. It's very flattering. It's not super short or long, it hits around the waist. It looks good with leggings or jeans. I also like that the material is not super thick or too thin. It's perfect!
Love this beautiful and very soft sweatshirt!

评论概述: Elevates workout wear to street wear
评论详情: Gorgeous color, nice fit, runs true to size ( little oversized, but not long in the waist).  A little thick weight but overall, a great addition to my wardrobe.  i wear it with a white tank over black leggings.  It takes workout wear to street wear!  I also bought it in white.

This sweatshirt is light to mid weight, it is SUPER comfortable! I tried on my first one and immediately ordered another in a different color! The fit is true to size, although I will say it is a little shorter than normal but not cropped fitting. I’m only 5’3 and it is barely longer than waist
This is the softest and most comfortable top!
very comfortable I really like them. They are not a heavy sweatshirt, but very attractive I have two of them

评论概述: Love this style and particularly the color
评论详情: Nothing bad to say about this sweatshirt love everything about it except one thing… I wish the band around the hips was a bit tighter. I’m 5 foot four with a tummy but no butt! This hides the tummy Well enough, so of course, I’m going to wear it… I feel very fashionable in this, and it washes beautifully.
True to size. Very comfortable.
I ordered a (M) size according to the size chart and reviews but this garment was wayyyy to big overall.  I was also surprised that no pockets were in the design.  5.4', 139 lbs.
Wear my normal size and so incredibly soft - you won’t be disappointed
This top is so soft and cute and comfortable. i get compliments on it every time
Love this
This is so much like the very expensive spanx half-zip! I liked it so much about another in a different color.
This sweatshirt is so soft and fits great.  I like it so much I ordered several.
Great as an airport sweater. Looks great under long black coat.
Love it so much and bought three! Sweatshirt is definitely oversized. No need to size up.

I'm 5'5" and 130 lbs. The small is a perfect fit. There's plenty of room to layer a tank or tee underneath. It's soft, comfy, stretchy, and definitely looks higher end than a typical sweatshirt. I ordered the khaki first. I love it so much I just ordered more colors.

From the reviews I decided to go a size up and got an XL, I’m 5’3 and have a shorter torso so it doesn’t lay cropped on me like I’ve seen from the other reviews so keep that in mind. If you’re shorter and have a shorter torso then it will fit like a normal crewneck. I really like the material and the quality is there especially for the price. I can definitely see if you have a bigger chest then you have the potential to have lay more like a cropped crew neck.
I bought 2 & I might buy more!  Softest most comfortable shirt ever!  You can’t call it a sweatshirt cause it’s not that kind of material but it’s comfortable & just pet!

This pull over is exactly what it looks like in the picture! The material is perfect! Very breathable and not too thick but it’s not too thin. I have worn this a few times since my purchase and washes well!

This top is so soft with a nice drape. I sized down one size since it was oversized. It will be the perfect top with my Promover pants for travel. It does have a plastic zipper which isn't too bad for just leisure wear.

评论概述: Trendy Queen Womens Oversized Sweatshirts Half Zip Pullover
评论详情: Love this sweatshirt!

If any top says it runs large, I order an XL if it says it fits true to size, I order a two XL. This one is an XL. I am 5’1” 145 pounds, and I love the fit! I do not like anything that fits tight. This top is perfect in an XL.
I bought this for my daughter and she loved it and got asked about where she bought it at work.

I am 6' tall so my torso and arms are long. I thought this looked adorable on the model, so I ordered it. The sleeves are poofy and plenty of length, but the waist is shorter than I'd like. My high waisted mom jeans meet the bottom of the blouse. It won't hide what I always try to hide and that's my lack of figure as I age. The weight of the material is heavy and thick, which is great for a chilly office. I love the collar and the coffee color, but the waist is a 👎. I think I'll pass this one onto my daughter. The length is the only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars.

I should have done more research on reviews before purchasing. I have been pulling the sweatshirt down all day, it is much shorter than I am used to. But it is a good quality and blends well with a black undershirt. Keeping it, but wanted to share the length if you're looking for something longer. Hopeful it washes up nicely.  Sweatshirt stops at top of my index finger in photo.
Very soft material and love the fit.

It is a softy, silky kind of material. I am 5'4 and curvier and its a little bit shorter than I would like. I wanted it to wear over my scrubs. I did keep it and will probably wear it again but not necessarily what I was looking for.
Quality product and heavy weight material. I will be ordering other colors!!!
The perfect fall layer!
Super soft fabric. Good length between cropped and long. Loose fit for layering. Great price!

I love this sweatshirt. I wear it all the time! The one con is that it does not have pockets. But it is very comfortable, soft, and oversized. I wear it all the time around the house and also out running errands. I’ve gotten a lot of compliments on it too!

评论概述: Cute and Flattering - Plastic Zipper is Tacky
评论详情: I love the look of this sweatshirt, the coffee-grey color is gorgeous.  It is comfy and warm without being too heavy, perfect for fall evenings or a chilly office.  I'm 5'5" and the length is perfect.  My one complaint is that the zipper is plastic, which I find tacky.  I'm surprised no one else has mentioned that in their review.  I won't be comfortable wearing it everywhere as I think that looks cheap, but other than that, it's very cute and comfy and worth the money.

I purchased this based on an influencer review and am underwhelmed. The fabric is super soft (a plus) but lacks quality, and the inner seams are visible on the collar which I felt made it look cheap. It is a little short in the length which I thought would be perfect with my higher rise leggings, but instead I just kind of look plumpy. For reference I am 5'4", 135lbs with an athletic build. Of course my daughter is 5"2' and 110lbs and she looks perfect in it.
It's really warm, fits perfect, and is great for fall!

评论概述: My absolute favorite! Dressier than a normal sweatshirt. Love this so much!
评论详情: I absolutely love this sweatshirt. It is so soft and just feels so nice. A cashier actually thought it was from SPANX. I have washed it numerous times and no issues. I tumble low for a few minutes, hang up and don't even need to iron or touch up. I did order a small and this hits my waste perfect with jeans and leggings and joggers. I am 5'3" 120lbs. I am a 32-34 up top and I layer with a tank top and leave the zipper open. I love how I can dress it up. I just ordered a black one and wish there was a red!!! Hoping it lasts a long time because I love it and this shade is so perfect for fall!!
Nice looking sweatshirt. Looks and feels high end. Not super comfy feeling but it’s perfect to dress up or not.
Love the soft silky fabric.  It is lightweight for mild temps.  Comparable to the Sp*nx one I have, but much less money.
This sweatshirt is so soft! The material hangs softly and looks dressy. You can wear it as workout gear or to the office. I just love it!

The style was nice BUT I thought the fabric was going to be more of a sweatshirt type of fabric like shown in the photos which would have been so nice for winter, but the fabric is more thin and slinky....definitely not the greatest for cold winter days in my opinion. The sleeves hung over my hands and I have long arms. I guess you could always pull the sleeves up, but they were way too long on me. Very disappointed so I only gave the shirt 3 stars.
This is a great lulu dupe.  Love the cut.  It’s a little cropped but not super cropped.  The fabric is so nice!  I have noticed a little pilling after multiple washes but still looks and feels great!
Purchased several of these Very pleased with the quality Run a little large in my opinion I typically wear a medium but I think a small would have fit me better
This sweatshirt was not over sized. In fact I had to return this one and I order one size up and now I love it.

A lot of the reviews stated this was over sized so I ordered the XL thinking it would be perfect… but the XL fit like a large & was way too small. The material was really nice & garment looked very well made… but just too small.
I love this product! I bought it to replace one from A&F that was significantly more money and didn’t fit well at all. This one is a great fabric and fits beautifully. Worth every penny

This jacket is cute enough and I like the style of it a lot—but seriously, who wants a jacket with NO POCKETS?  A zipper pocket for a phone would make this jacket perfection—as it is, it’s just annoying.
I’ve done everything and can’t get wrinkles out.
Love the color and is very soft. Size up. I ordered a large and could have gone up to xl based on the length. My normal size is a medium. The length is shorter than expected.
I love this sweatshirt. I saw it on an Instagram post & bought one in tan. I loved it so much I bought another one in gray. Super soft & comfortable. Travels well.
Cozy, flattering but material was very hot.
These are great quality and personally I like it better than my Span- that looks just like it.  Extremely pleased
So soft and comfy!
It was too big for being a small. Fit like a large
I like this.  The color is nice, but not quite what I was looking for. Too late to return so in my closet it goes.
I've bought a lot of these types of tops and have returned most until this one. I found this one to be soft, comfortable and an elevated sweatshirt look. Perfect dupe for the pricy brands!

评论概述: It is so soft and comfy !!!

I actually bought this in white and washed it and it is SOOO soft and comfortable! You can tell the by the material that the color will not fade! I was going to return the blue one but I am going to keep it. You won't be sorry you got this~
This is well made and a light/medium weight sweatshirt! Love it. Sizing is perfect. I got the white and it washes great! I do hang to dry though!

I wear a medium in shirts, but got this in a large, and it fits just like I wanted.  There is a little room,  so if you want it tighter, get your normal size.  It is the softest shirt I own!  I love it!!!!
The most comfortable sweatshirt and it's classy enough for work.  I have two colors and think I might need a few more!
This sweatshirt is great quality, has a very nice thickness to the material and perfect amount of stretch and give. Very flattering!
